alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:21PM MST until August 13 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 200 PM MST. * At 121 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quartzsite, or 30 miles south of Parker, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quartzsite. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 9 and 22. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 102 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
